Another note: I installed the updates that it had and it deactivated, but I was able to reactivate it. RTM means release to manufacturing. Now just have to see if it will stay activated.

Yes that's the only problem, the lock screen and start screen are unusable after you set them first time. This may not be a real final version. Everything seems right except the help section says "what's new in release preview". Don't worry, windows 8 gets tomorrow. I'm sure you'll get the real version here soon.
